cn.description:
”蜂软扫描“是什么？
蜂软扫描是一款小巧、简单、灵活、易于使用的扫描类应用程序。使用它您可以扫描文件、证书、银行卡、发票、收据、票据，并导出高质量图片和PDF文件。此外，您只需轻轻一按即可通过文字识别功能从任何图片中提取文本。
它也是一款相机扫描仪，具有简洁、高效的用户界面，其主色调为黑白，整个应用程序均饰有蓝绿色和铬黄色。

如何扫描文档？
- 您可以选择从照片或相机一键扫描所有内容。
- 扫描后可立即编辑文档，包括添加、旋转、调整、重新排序和删除页面等功能。
- 通过旋转、裁剪和调整滤镜可以让扫描的质量更上一层楼。
- 拥有五种滤镜模式来增强您的扫描效果 - 原始、黑白 1、黑白 2、彩色、灰度。此外，每个滤镜都可以根据自己的亮度、对比度、饱和度和锐化度进行细微调整。

如何管理文档？
- 主页上的“最近使用”模块显示了您最近添加的文档，您可以在这里更快地找到你想要的。
- 添加文件夹和子文件夹来管理所有文档。
- 重命名文件夹和文档，使它们更容易区分。
- 重要和紧急的文件可以加星标以便更快地访问。
- 搜索功能有助于从令人眼花缭乱的数据中找到您需要的文档。
- 每个文件夹、文档和页面都可以直接通过电子邮件、网盘或Wifi分享。
- 将扫描结果另存为 JPEG 照片。
- 移动/复制/删除文档。
- 连接到打印机后，可直接在应用程序内打印扫描件。

害怕数据丢失？
蜂软扫描支持与 iCloud 同步数据。

让使用更高效
方便 - 打开应用程序时立即打开相机。
快捷 - 自动保存扫描到照片。
智能 - 自动边缘检测和增强。
简单 - 以PDF格式共享文档和文件夹。
安全 - 使用密码保护您的文件。

更多问题？
如果您对蜂软扫描有任何问题，请发送电子邮件至scango@beesoft.io，我们将尽快帮助您解决。

cn.description:
《无处遁形：全网公敌》是Steam平台广受好评的剧情向黑客解密游戏《全网公敌》手游版本。玩家通过网络搜索和社工手段获取目标人物信息，其隐藏最深的秘密都无处遁形。游戏中的每个故事看似各自独立，但随着剧情的发展却是草蛇灰线，伏脉千里。当所有事件串联起来，竟隐藏着惊天的秘密……

希望玩家在游玩的同时，对网络本身也能产生反思，学会保护好个人隐私。

【游戏内容】
◆第一章：程序员之死
某公司CEO跳楼自杀，自称被毒妻勒索千万；而妻子却在社交网络上发布被家暴的照片。谣言满天，谁在说谎？
◆第二章：看不见的眼睛
女大学生的不雅视频在网络疯传，这一刻，她已然社会性死亡。到底谁才是始作俑者？女性的安全又该由谁去保护？
◆第三章：消失的证据
品学兼优的学生会长忽然失踪。霸凌事件使案情越发扑朔迷离。谁是凶手，谁是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代价
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！恐吓信、炒作、前女团成员自杀事件……网络再掀舆论狂欢！
◆第五章：永生代码
当社会陷入癫狂，你是否也愿意加入永生代码，获得真正的爱与永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一个看似甜蜜而美满的家庭背后，每个人都有各自的秘密，隐藏在背后的真相到底是什么？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一场离奇的车祸，让泰坦公司的高级研究员Lucrezia Borgia博士当场死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死里逃生，但他却没有意识到自己即将卷入一场巨大的阴谋之中……

【游戏特点】
◆代入感强：在虚构的世界里，玩家扮演一名黑客，接受一家公司委托，完成一个个不同的社工事件，体验真实的黑客操作。
◆玩法多样：游戏内有多个系统，除了社工系统，还会有推理、追踪、解谜，破坏侵入等系统需要玩家们去一一攻破。
◆剧情复杂：游戏中你将面临大量的选择和谜题，而不同的选择可能将导致不同的结局。
◆人物众多：登场人物众多，每个人物都有自己的性格特点，而他们背后都有着不为人知的故事，需要作为黑客的你去一一发现事件的真相。
◆全程配音：游戏中所有出现的角色都有真人配音，让整个游戏的体验和代入感更加强烈。
◆原创音乐：多首原创主题曲以及各种音乐音效，搭配精彩剧情，享受震撼体验。

【核心功能】
◆网络搜索：玩家通过浏览器搜索功能收集目标对象的基础信息。
◆数据库：利用已知信息输入到数据库中，通过筛选后或许目标对象的其他信息。
◆破解：通过获得的目标人物信息来生成密码，用于登陆各平台的账户（包括邮箱、社交平台、聊天软件等）。
◆伪装：获取目标对象的需求、社交圈等，根据信息选择伪装，通过和目标对象接触获取更多信息。
◆聊天沟通：添加目标对象为好友后，进行聊天沟通获取信息。
◆图片分析：从图片中获取有价值的信息内容及相关线索。
当然，后期还会解锁更多的高阶社工方法！

cn.description:
《便利店开业日记》是一款模拟经营类游戏，你将化身店长，从经营一家丰富多彩的便利店开始。在游戏过程中，你需要设置货架、培养店员、服务顾客......快来打造最客流最高、最受欢迎的连锁便利店！

【精心陈列，打造特色专柜!】
研究商品搭配，精心打造人气货架。不断开发新商品，打造更多特色专柜吧！

【精确经营，把握商品库存！】
时刻关注货架情况，设置合理的补货数量，减少废弃率，实现利润最大化！

【培养店员，赢得比赛优胜！】
通过完成挑战提升店员各项能力，为客户提供更好的服务，同时冲击评选赛优胜！

【满足顾客，获取丰厚回报！】
分发试用商品，俘获顾客们的青睐。满足顾客心愿，培养店铺的忠实顾客！

【开设分店，打造连锁品牌!】
不断扩张规模，在新地区开设分店。击败本地对手，打造你的连锁便利店品牌！

便利店里有 200 种以上不同的产品！ 我惊讶地发现，这里的商品比我想象的还要多： 饭团、炸饭团、甜点布丁......还有零食薯片......我去便利店的时候，总会忍不住买一堆计划外的东西。所以，如果你能打造出精美的商品货架，顾客肯定也会大量购买的。此外， 您还可以享受与竞争对手商店的销售战！

——开罗君亲笔信

cn.description:
【游戏特色】
坐落于神秘远星的枪牢森严诡谲，无数枪怪弹魔徘徊在地下深处——传说中可以抹去过去的神枪亦藏匿于此。射击，劫掠，翻滚躲闪，背负痛苦回忆的探险者孤注一掷，突进层层膛室，在枪林弹雨中寻找能够翻转命运的终极宝藏……
▶ 原汁原味的枪弹地狱
狱室迷宫随机错布，每一层都充斥着穷凶极恶的枪支炮灰，终极恶魔各自布下奇诡的枪火弹网。选择不同背景的英雄角色，穿越重重膛室和机关陷阱探索神枪残迹。
▶ 天马行空的神枪宝藏
变蛇激光、豌豆射手、彩虹、蜜蜂——没错，蜜蜂！每把枪里射出的都是未知，亦能和掉落道具组合出1+1>2。探险者的背包不设上限，各类彩蛋奇宝都在地牢深处等待发掘。
▶ 枪打子弹？子弹打枪？
所有人都是枪的忠实信徒，一切都和枪弹有关！弹壳货币、子弹小怪、扳机兄弟……在地牢里，你甚至可以扮演一个用子弹枪发射枪子弹的子弹人！

【针对手游的设计优化】
▶ 打不过？就「滚弹」！
面对密集的子弹壁垒，使用“无敌”翻滚灵活闪避！切换多种翻滚模式，选择自动、手动或半辅助瞄准射击，自定义调整按键布局，我们希望为玩家提供最适配手游的操作应对地牢难关！
▶ 双人协作，联机闯关
我们专门为移动端开发了线上联机双人模式。在联机大厅创建/加入房间，或是通过好友系统邀请伙伴，自由选择角色并肩作战！
---------------------------
在游戏过程中需要帮助，或遇到问题，都可以加入官方群联系管理员，管理员会与大家一对一沟通，帮忙解决
【XD×挺进地牢】官方9群：778206081

cn.description:
一款近乎真实、专业的战争模拟游戏！置身战略军事沙盒中，畅享接近现实的物理引擎。Landfall官方授权，Steam超12万条玩家评测，97%好评率，在游戏中排兵布阵，战术演练，带给你身临其境的战争体验。

游戏基于PC原版移植，买断制发售，并针对手机玩家的操作和观看体验做出专门优化。

【史诗级的战役演出】
在战役模式中，巧妙利用地图地形和兵种阵容，制定花式布兵打法投入战场。由于“超现实”的物理引擎效果，战斗中将会迸发许多意料之外的状况；拉进镜头，切换子弹时间，好戏才刚刚上演！

【100+天马行空的兵种】
游戏提供百余种性能（性格）各不相同的兵种，来自各个派系、时代文明和神话传说。从发射尖刺的仙人掌到召唤分身耍棍的孙悟空，这些“训练有素”的战士能够对战局起到蝴蝶效应般的影响。

【自定义沙盒，兵种DIY】
不满足于挑战既定的战役？玩转沙盒模式，自由切换地图，自定义战局和对战阵容，随意拿捏自己想要的兵种属性、服装，和武器技能，打造独一无二的奇迹憨憨军团演绎精彩战斗。

【支持联机】
手机版加入联机对战模式和房间大厅；随机匹配，又或是邀请好友尽情切磋！

hk.description:
歡迎我們的客人蒞臨鏽湖旅館，並確保他們在此過得愉快。本週將有5頓晚餐，確保每頓晚餐都值得讓他們為之獻身！

《鏽湖旅館》是一款獨特的益智遊戲，它離奇古怪的場景設置靈感源自於大衛‧林區的電視連續劇《雙峰》。

主要特點：

操作簡單：容易上手，但一玩起來就停不下來。
無數的謎題：共有6個房間，充滿了各式各樣又獨特的腦力激盪。
驚悚而動人的故事：將會有5次伴有有趣的客人和員工們的用餐。
懸念叢生的氛圍：鏽湖旅館是一個超現實的地方，在這裡任何事情都有可能發生……
令人印象深刻的配樂：每個房間都有專屬設計的主題曲。
成就：一個你從未見過的空前走廊。

我們會一步一步地揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的Facebook @rustylakecom

hk.description:
Klei Entertainment與《超級兄弟：劍與巫術》、《超時空戰隊》和《Below》（深入地下）的開發商CAPY攜手合作，為《饑荒》的粉絲們奉上最新的單人遊戲資料片：《饑荒：海難》！

在《饑荒：海難》中，威爾遜發現自己被困在了一個熱帶群島中。在全新的環境中，迎接他的是新的生物、生物群落及季節，他必須學會適應這一切才能逃出生天。

千萬不要因為熱帶微風的吹拂而萌生性命無憂的錯覺，形勢可能急轉直下，但這依然是殘酷的環境與玩家的不妥協之間的一場較量。你很快便會發現，島嶼上充滿凶險，殺機四伏。

主要功能

在茫茫大海中前行：打造一艘船，然後揚帆開啟探險之旅！

探索新世界：世界大不同。探索充滿著新資源的全新生物群落。搜尋新的食物來源。利用眾多新生物維生。

應對全新的季節挑戰：熱帶地區的一系列季節挑戰勢要將你置於死地。

打造全新配方：打造一系列新工具，努力克服島上的惡劣環境並生存下去。

hk.description:
在一所心理健康中心裡醒來的Robert Hill罹患了嚴重的失憶症。他需要每天遵循嚴格的作息時間，通過探索自己的夢境來找回記憶。

The White Door是一款由方塊逃脫和鏽湖系列遊戲的開發者製作的指向與點擊式冒險遊戲。

關鍵特徵:

■ 操作簡單
容易上手，但一旦玩起來就停不下來

■ 獨特的故事線
每天恪守嚴格的作息時間，探尋夢境，並找回記憶。多樣的謎題妙趣橫生，讓你意猶未盡。

■ 前所未有的分屏式體驗
你將有機會探尋Robert Hill在心理健康中心裡的經歷，而全新的分屏模式也會帶給你一個嶄新的體驗。

■ 極具代入感的氛圍
精神衛生中心每天的氣氛變幻莫測，懸念叢生，讓你沉浸在詭譎疊起的情節裡不能自拔。

■ 身臨其境般的音效
由Victor Butzelaar製作的主題曲和音效讓你身臨其境。

■ 特別成就
The White Door會留下很多尚待揭曉的懸念。

hk.description:
艾蘭德（Eilander）家族中的長子——雅各布（Jakob）在母親去世後回到了天堂島。自從母親離奇死亡後，這座島嶼彷彿被十災詛咒了。一起來尋找母親的隱藏記憶，參加離奇的家族儀式，阻止災禍的發生！

《鏽湖：天堂島》是由創作了《方塊逃脫》系列、《鏽湖旅館》和《鏽湖根源》的鏽湖推出的第三個點選式冒險遊戲。

遊戲特性：

遊戲容易上手：易於上手卻讓你愛不釋手
獨特的故事情節：首個基於埃及十災的冒險遊戲
一玩難忘的解謎遊戲體驗：每一場災禍都有獨特的風格、懸念及充滿鏽湖特色的燒腦謎題
令人激動的畫面設計：由荷蘭畫家約翰·赦夫特（Johan Scherft）手繪的粉筆畫背景
超有畫面感的遊戲音樂：每場災禍都有自己的主題曲和變奏曲
成就：島上還有更多的秘密等你揭開

我們會一步一步揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網 RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的微博 @RustyLake_official

hk.description:
***注意：Don`t Starve需要iOS 8和至少iPhone 5、iPad 3或iPad mini 2。由於記憶體限制，它無法在更早的裝置上執行。***

Don`t Starve: Pocket Edition行動版將深受超過4百萬玩家喜愛的熱門PC遊戲移植到了iPhone和iPad平台。現在你可以隨時隨地進入充滿科學和魔法元素的世界，體驗原汁原味的荒野生存遊戲！

你扮演威爾遜，一位被困住並傳送到神秘荒野世界的勇敢無畏的紳士科學家。如果威爾遜希望逃出生天並找到回家的路，他必須充分利用所處的環境及這裡的各種生物。

進入一個光怪陸離而未經探索的世界，這裡充滿了奇怪的生物以及形形色色的危險和意外。收集資源以製作符合你的生存風格的物品和建築。一路解開這塊奇怪大陸上的各種謎團。

********************************************************

獎項：
- 獨立遊戲節：大獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：優秀設計獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：玩家選擇獎提名
 - Capsule Computers：編輯選擇獎
 - Indie Game Reviewer：年度最佳遊戲

主要特色：

針對觸控操作進行優化：新的直觀觸控介面讓你可以輕鬆探索、戰鬥、合成和管理物品。

原汁原味的生存和世界探索體驗：沒有說明。沒有幫助。無需手持。從一無所有開始，為了生存而合成物品、捕獵、研究、耕種和戰鬥。

黑暗而異想天開的視覺效果：處於獨特3D世界中的2D人物和古怪生物。

隨機產生的新世界：想要新地圖？沒問題！你可以隨時產生一個不斷變化的全新世界，它憎恨你並想你死掉。

hk.description:
當詹姆斯·范德布姆在自己所繼承房子的花園裡種下一顆特殊的種子後，他的生活發生了遽變。在人生之樹上通過揭開畫像來擴展你的血緣關係。
《銹湖：根源》是由創作了密室逃脫系列銹湖旅館的銹湖公司開發的第二款付費點擊類冒險遊戲。

獨一無二的故事情節：經歷遊戲角色們的人生始末，並建立你獨屬的家譜。

點擊/輕擊箭頭，使用拖拽或滑動等方式在遊戲環境中導航。某些物品可以拖動。通過輕擊/點擊與人們以及各種物品進行互動。選擇在你的清單中找到的物品，並輕擊屏幕上的某處來使用它們。

The Past Within - 更新版本 

為了慶祝Rusty Lake迎來第九週年，我們在 Underground Blossom 以及 The Past Within in 兩款遊戲加點巧思，開發新的小遊戲。歡迎關注我們的平台，查看如何從The Past Within的過去和未來之間，解鎖這次的祕密小遊戲！

更新說明

hk.description:
備註：The Past Within 是一款雙人合作遊戲。雙方玩家皆須於各自的設備上備有此款遊戲（手機、平板或電腦）以及互相溝通的管道。與夥伴一起遊玩，或到官方Discord來找尋志同道合的夥伴吧！

自己一人是無法探索未來與過去的！快找朋友一同拼湊線索來解開Albert Vanderboom的謎團。和朋友互相交流自己所看見的世界，來幫助彼此解開謎題、探索不同的時空！

The Past Within 是首款雙人合作的 點擊式冒險遊戲，架構於Rusty Lake的神祕世界中。

特色

▪ 達到雙人合作的經驗 
與朋友一起遊玩，一位探索過去，一位開發未來。一同合作來解開謎團，幫助Rose啟動她父親的計畫！
▪ 兩個世界 - 兩種視角 
兩位玩家將會以不同的層面去探索各自的世界。既有2D也有3D呈現 - 一種從未存在於 Rusty Lake 世界觀的遊玩方式！
▪ 跨平台遊玩
只要能與夥伴互相溝通，你們即可於各自偏好的平台一同來進行遊戲，支援的系統有：Mac、PC以及Nintendo Switch！
▪ 遊玩時長＆可重複遊玩
此遊戲含有兩個篇章，平均遊玩時間約為２小時。若想全方面體驗此款遊戲，我們非常建議可以再以不同的視角遊玩一次。 此外！可透過重複遊玩來使用嶄新的視角去解開謎團。

hk.description:
沉浸於Rusty Lake 所打造的地鐵內，在 Laura Vanderboom的生命及回憶中穿梭

探索在象徵著Laura過去與未來的站台之間。解開謎題，尋覓並搭上列車，揭曉Laura的人生經歷，幫助她理解這曲折的人生，逃離腐壞的內心

「Underground Blossom」是一款由 the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake 系列的創作者所新開發的點擊式冒險遊戲，
特色

▪ 於熟悉的設定裡找到新體驗
沉浸在Rusty Lake經典的點擊式謎題當中，扣人心弦的神祕故事外，當然還有更多謎題等著各位

▪ 本車將於多站停留
本次路線將於七處獨特的車站進行停留，各站特色皆展示了Laura Vanderboom的生活、回憶及潛在的未來。預計旅程時間為兩小時

▪ 聰明的你們知道該如何做
一如往常，各位將在各車站解開藏在意想不到之處的祕密，獲得成就之餘，或許還會意外發現什麼其他驚喜！

▪ 戴上耳機更沉浸其中
每一站皆有由Victor Butzelaar量身打造的氛圍音樂迎接各位，更棒的是，遊戲中還有由大提琴家Sebastiaan van Halsema所帶來的演奏，讓整個體驗更為豐富！

hk.description:
一封絕望的信件將Paul Trilby偵探召喚至一座奇特的島嶼小鎮，該小鎮被高牆分隔，並由醫院掌控。當地居民進入醫院後，卻是失去記憶後地回來。一個險惡的陰謀正在當地醞釀著。你能解開這個謎團的真相嗎？

運用你的智慧、好奇心和發散性思維，藉由當地居民的協助，一步步破解謎題。請記住，當地的流言中總藏有一絲真相

《Follow the Meaning》是一款受經典遊戲 Samorost與Rusty Lake系列啟發的超現實手繪點擊冒險遊戲

特色

■ 手繪美術帶你走進這個別具一格的世界
■ 奇異的世界觀下隱藏著險惡的氣息
■ 由Victor Butzelaar創作的氛圍音樂
■ 一個等待你細心挖掘的扭曲謎團
■ 平均遊戲時間：1.5 小時

hk.releaseNotes:
Thanks for using ScanGo!

In this update: 
 Fixed some minor bugs and improved stability

We’d love to hear from you! If you have any ideas, suggestions, or feature requests for future versions, feel free to share them with us anytime.

Just drop us an email at: scango@beesoft.io
hk.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

hk.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

勇士，歡迎踏入這片充滿遠古氣息的石器大陸！千年古龍從沉睡中蘇醒，蠻荒巨獸在荒野遊蕩，文明的火種與原始的力量在此碰撞交織。曾經守護大陸的秩序已然鬆動，而你，將從這片土地的起點出發，帶著對未知的好奇與對強者的渴望，踏上一場跨越山川湖海的勇者征途。​

在這裡，你會見證晨光中的原始部落，穿越迷霧籠罩的古龍巢穴，在一次次戰鬥中突破自我；你會邂逅並肩作戰的夥伴，收服忠誠可靠的寵物，在協作中攻克看似不可戰勝的難關；你更會在掛機成長中穩步變強，在多元玩法中收穫樂趣，在家族同心中共築榮耀 —— 這片大陸的每一寸土地，都在等待你書寫專屬的獵龍傳奇。

◆ 遊戲特色 ◆

「多元夥伴」 與夥伴和寵物共戰 BOSS / 免費與召喚雙渠道獲取​
冒險的路上，可靠的夥伴與寵物從不缺席！在這篇神奇的大陸，養育了各種強大和擁有神奇熟悉的寵物，去馴服它們，和它們並肩作戰。每隻寵物都有不同的屬性，熱情好戰的火屬性戰寵；移動神速的風屬性神寵；不動如山的土屬性守護神；治癒親和的葉屬性夥伴；還有神秘莫測的機械戰寵。
無需氪金，透過主線任務、限時活動即可免費解鎖實用夥伴；強力戰寵也能透過野外捕獲、日常活動輕鬆獲取，陪你探索大陸奧秘。若想擁有稀有夥伴與遠古戰寵，召喚系統為你開啟可能：最強夥伴菲尼、神話神寵酷比等強力存在，將以獨特技能為你的戰鬥助力，協同作戰讓獵龍更從容。
​
「豐富玩法」 告別單一戰鬥模式 / 暢享多元獵龍樂趣​
掛機戰鬥之外，更多趣味玩法等你來解鎖！競技場中，與全服獵龍者同臺競技，憑藉戰力爭奪排名，贏取專屬獎勵；狩獵場裡，直面咆哮的古龍與巨型巨獸，成功擊敗即可獲取珍稀素材，升級強力裝備；特色副本囊括各類升級材料，還有難度逐步提升的挑戰，滿足你的探索欲；跨服活動更匯聚各區精英，組隊挑戰跨服 BOSS、參與跨服團戰，在團隊協作中感受熱血與激情。​

「家族同心」 共築獵龍榮耀 / 攜手同行更顯溫暖​
加入家族，從此獵龍之路不再孤單！與族員完成家族任務，共建家族莊園，享受集體勞動的成果；定期開啟家族 BOSS 挑戰，組隊直面強大 BOSS，同心協力擊敗後人人可分豐厚獎勵；熱血家族戰如約而至，與其他家族爭奪大陸霸權，贏取家族榮譽與全族福利；家族副本更需全員協作，在配合中攻克難關，凝聚家族情誼，共同書寫屬於你們的家族獵龍傳奇。​

「海量福利」 助力獵龍啟程 / 登錄即享重磅權益​
無需繁瑣積累，福利從啟程便一路相伴！登錄遊戲即刻解鎖 VIP5 特權，專屬屬性加成、珍稀道具領取權限同步開啟；每日簽到禮包從不缺席，遊戲代幣和強化材料輕鬆收入囊中；更有全服通關慶典禮 —— 當全服玩家共同突破關鍵副本，人人可領豐厚獎勵；區服首通專屬嘉獎同步上線，讓你從開始就領先一步。​

「掛機成長」 解鎖無限獵龍征途 / 離線也能穩步變強​
這是一場無需「肝度」的輕鬆征程！遊戲主打掛機類戰鬥模式，無論你是忙碌通勤還是休憩放鬆，角色都會自動探索戰場、擊敗對手，持續積累經驗與戰力。從初出茅廬的新手玩家，到能與 BOSS 抗衡的傳奇強者，等級提升、技能解鎖、裝備強化全不耽誤，離線收益即時累積，讓你隨時回歸都能感受成長的喜悅，無限獵龍之路永不停止。​

advisories: 頻繁/極度的恐怖或驚嚇題材
頻繁/極度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.description:
Henry was the lead animator at Joey Drew Studios in its 1930s heyday, a studio that was best known for producing animated cartoons of their most popular and beloved character, Bendy. Many years later Henry receives a mysterious invitation from Joey Drew himself to return to the old cartoon workshop. Journey deep into the sketchy madness of this twisted cartoon nightmare. 

Fight the darkness. Escape the Ink Demon. Fear the Machine.

• Varied Game Play! - First person combat, horror, puzzles, stealth and numerous hidden secrets.
• A Beautiful Cartoon World! - Lovingly crafted by a small indie studio.
• A Global Bendy Community! - Delve deep into the mystery and join the discussion at joeydrewstudios.com

hk.releaseNotes:
What’s New

Improved overall performance for smoother gameplay

Optimized the game for better stability and responsiveness

Adjusted screen resolutions to better support different displays

Updated compatibility to support the latest devices, including new iPhone models (e.g. iPhone 17)
hk.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

hk.artistName: Shenzhen Tongguan Network Technology Co., Ltd.
hk.sellerName: Shenzhen Tongguan Network Technology Co., Ltd.
hk.description:
這是一款革新式的Roguelite遊戲：
◆ “卡牌構築×戰棋”深度融合的獨特玩法。
◆ 獨創的多牌同出玩法帶來新鮮體驗。



作為硬核向的策略遊戲，《魔卡棋旅》有：
◆ 隨機生成的戰鬥場景和地圖節點，帶來了豐富的戰鬥體驗。
◆ 6個獨特的職業，每個職業的構築玩法都是獨一無二的。
◆ 300+張卡牌和100+種秘寶與道具，每一局遊戲都是全新的驚奇冒險！
◆ 多周目層層遞進的難度挑戰。
◆ 碎片化程序儲存技術，隨時隨地玩幾下或是持續玩夠一局90分鐘的冒險全都可以！

hk.description:

《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是一個完整長度的冒險遊戲。玩家將扮演一個流亡到垃圾堆的小機器人，從廢料場返回城市，並打敗壞人黑帽兄弟，拯救他的機器人女友。玩家需要使用邏輯、收集重要資訊及物品，來解決各式難題，才可以拯救機器人女友。快一起和可愛的小機器人，解開重重的謎團吧！

hk.description:
Have you ever thought about building up your own empire, without the risk of ending up sleeping under a bridge? Become the owner of a pawn shop and haggle like your life depends on it!

Start small, grow big!
Begin your journey in a rundown shack and build up your business day by day by negotiating with customers, hiring employees and partaking in auctions.
But be careful! Scammers will try to take advantage of you with fake items and if someone ever wants to sell you a questionable “insurance” better choose your next words wisely...
Each customer behaves differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits. It’s up to you to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them and how to seal the deal!
Use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire!

Dealer’s Life 2 Main Features
- The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
- A myriad of items to buy and sell with fake items to avoid (or exploit!)
- Infinite customers to haggle with, each with their own personality and appearance
- Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others.
- Auctions! For times when you crave a little bit of extra adrenaline... aaand SOLD!
- Loads of jokes and quotes from cult movies and video games

Your favorite pawn shop experience is finally getting a sequel! Haggle like your life depends on it in this funny tycoon game. You never know what is gonna stumble through that door!

hk.description:
Dealer's Life is a funny tycoon game where you manage your own pawn shop. Haggle with infinite generated customers to buy and sell infinite generated items!
Have fun for hours and use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire! Thanks to procedural generation, special characters and random events you’ll never know what’s coming next!

Dealer’s Life main features:
• Infinite items to buy and sell, all procedurally generated, with fake and counterfeit items to avoid (or exploit!)
• Infinite customers to haggle with, each with his own personality and appearance, all procedurally generated. Will you manage to recognize their personality only by looking at them?
• The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
• Be the smartest and quickest bidder and beat your rivals to buy prestigious items in exciting auctions!
• Customize your character’s skills and play different games depending on what you decide to increase, finding the game style that suits you most
• Manage your pawn shop’s features: keep track of your inventory, position in town, maximum number of customers per day and many more
• Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others. Buy, repair, estimate and resell for huge gain!
• Random events, recurrent characters and different game endings will make every game a unique experience!
• Lots of humour and quotes from cult movies and videogames

Thousands of unique customers, with unique behaviors and traits: they all behave differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits which are reflected on their appearance. It’s up to you, with the help of your character Insight skill, to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them, when to push and when you will have to just accept their offer.

Try to amass enough money to transfer to a new pawn shop with a better look and better city placement: your daily number of customers will surely grow! And keep your inventory full of items, collecting legendary items to attract even more customers!

Fight the market to become the best trader out there and live the ultimate pawn shop experience with Dealer’s Life!

We are constantly improving the game, if you have any feedback about the game, your experience or anything else have a look at our Roadmap ( https://trello.com/b/nAAmRDHM ) and contact us through our social media pages:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DealersLife
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/DealersLife

hk.trackName: 石器情懷服歸來M-1秒找回20年情懷
hk.description:
勇士，歡迎踏入這片充滿遠古氣息的石器大陸！千年古龍從沉睡中蘇醒，蠻荒巨獸在荒野遊蕩，文明的火種與原始的力量在此碰撞交織。曾經守護大陸的秩序已然鬆動，而你，將從這片土地的起點出發，帶著對未知的好奇與對強者的渴望，踏上一場跨越山川湖海的勇者征途。​

在這裡，你會見證晨光中的原始部落，穿越迷霧籠罩的古龍巢穴，在一次次戰鬥中突破自我；你會邂逅並肩作戰的夥伴，收服忠誠可靠的寵物，在協作中攻克看似不可戰勝的難關；你更會在掛機成長中穩步變強，在多元玩法中收穫樂趣，在家族同心中共築榮耀 —— 這片大陸的每一寸土地，都在等待你書寫專屬的獵龍傳奇。

◆ 遊戲特色 ◆

「多元夥伴」 與夥伴和寵物共戰 BOSS / 免費與召喚雙渠道獲取​
冒險的路上，可靠的夥伴與寵物從不缺席！在這篇神奇的大陸，養育了各種強大和擁有神奇熟悉的寵物，去馴服它們，和它們並肩作戰。每隻寵物都有不同的屬性，熱情好戰的火屬性戰寵；移動神速的風屬性神寵；不動如山的土屬性守護神；治癒親和的葉屬性夥伴；還有神秘莫測的機械戰寵。
無需氪金，透過主線任務、限時活動即可免費解鎖實用夥伴；強力戰寵也能透過野外捕獲、日常活動輕鬆獲取，陪你探索大陸奧秘。若想擁有稀有夥伴與遠古戰寵，召喚系統為你開啟可能：最強夥伴菲尼、神話神寵酷比等強力存在，將以獨特技能為你的戰鬥助力，協同作戰讓獵龍更從容。
​
「豐富玩法」 告別單一戰鬥模式 / 暢享多元獵龍樂趣​
掛機戰鬥之外，更多趣味玩法等你來解鎖！競技場中，與全服獵龍者同臺競技，憑藉戰力爭奪排名，贏取專屬獎勵；狩獵場裡，直面咆哮的古龍與巨型巨獸，成功擊敗即可獲取珍稀素材，升級強力裝備；特色副本囊括各類升級材料，還有難度逐步提升的挑戰，滿足你的探索欲；跨服活動更匯聚各區精英，組隊挑戰跨服 BOSS、參與跨服團戰，在團隊協作中感受熱血與激情。​

「家族同心」 共築獵龍榮耀 / 攜手同行更顯溫暖​
加入家族，從此獵龍之路不再孤單！與族員完成家族任務，共建家族莊園，享受集體勞動的成果；定期開啟家族 BOSS 挑戰，組隊直面強大 BOSS，同心協力擊敗後人人可分豐厚獎勵；熱血家族戰如約而至，與其他家族爭奪大陸霸權，贏取家族榮譽與全族福利；家族副本更需全員協作，在配合中攻克難關，凝聚家族情誼，共同書寫屬於你們的家族獵龍傳奇。​

「海量福利」 助力獵龍啟程 / 登錄即享重磅權益​
無需繁瑣積累，福利從啟程便一路相伴！登錄遊戲即刻解鎖 VIP5 特權，專屬屬性加成、珍稀道具領取權限同步開啟；每日簽到禮包從不缺席，遊戲代幣和強化材料輕鬆收入囊中；更有全服通關慶典禮 —— 當全服玩家共同突破關鍵副本，人人可領豐厚獎勵；區服首通專屬嘉獎同步上線，讓你從開始就領先一步。​

「掛機成長」 解鎖無限獵龍征途 / 離線也能穩步變強​
這是一場無需「肝度」的輕鬆征程！遊戲主打掛機類戰鬥模式，無論你是忙碌通勤還是休憩放鬆，角色都會自動探索戰場、擊敗對手，持續積累經驗與戰力。從初出茅廬的新手玩家，到能與 BOSS 抗衡的傳奇強者，等級提升、技能解鎖、裝備強化全不耽誤，離線收益即時累積，讓你隨時回歸都能感受成長的喜悅，無限獵龍之路永不停止。​
hk.trackCensoredName: 石器情懷服歸來M-1秒找回20年情懷

hk.description:
STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

mo.description:
歡迎我們的客人蒞臨鏽湖旅館，並確保他們在此過得愉快。本週將有5頓晚餐，確保每頓晚餐都值得讓他們為之獻身！

《鏽湖旅館》是一款獨特的益智遊戲，它離奇古怪的場景設置靈感源自於大衛‧林區的電視連續劇《雙峰》。

主要特點：

操作簡單：容易上手，但一玩起來就停不下來。
無數的謎題：共有6個房間，充滿了各式各樣又獨特的腦力激盪。
驚悚而動人的故事：將會有5次伴有有趣的客人和員工們的用餐。
懸念叢生的氛圍：鏽湖旅館是一個超現實的地方，在這裡任何事情都有可能發生……
令人印象深刻的配樂：每個房間都有專屬設計的主題曲。
成就：一個你從未見過的空前走廊。

我們會一步一步地揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的Facebook @rustylakecom

mo.description:
Klei Entertainment與《超級兄弟：劍與巫術》、《超時空戰隊》和《Below》（深入地下）的開發商CAPY攜手合作，為《饑荒》的粉絲們奉上最新的單人遊戲資料片：《饑荒：海難》！

在《饑荒：海難》中，威爾遜發現自己被困在了一個熱帶群島中。在全新的環境中，迎接他的是新的生物、生物群落及季節，他必須學會適應這一切才能逃出生天。

千萬不要因為熱帶微風的吹拂而萌生性命無憂的錯覺，形勢可能急轉直下，但這依然是殘酷的環境與玩家的不妥協之間的一場較量。你很快便會發現，島嶼上充滿凶險，殺機四伏。

主要功能

在茫茫大海中前行：打造一艘船，然後揚帆開啟探險之旅！

探索新世界：世界大不同。探索充滿著新資源的全新生物群落。搜尋新的食物來源。利用眾多新生物維生。

應對全新的季節挑戰：熱帶地區的一系列季節挑戰勢要將你置於死地。

打造全新配方：打造一系列新工具，努力克服島上的惡劣環境並生存下去。

mo.description:
在一所心理健康中心裡醒來的Robert Hill罹患了嚴重的失憶症。他需要每天遵循嚴格的作息時間，通過探索自己的夢境來找回記憶。

The White Door是一款由方塊逃脫和鏽湖系列遊戲的開發者製作的指向與點擊式冒險遊戲。

關鍵特徵:

■ 操作簡單
容易上手，但一旦玩起來就停不下來

■ 獨特的故事線
每天恪守嚴格的作息時間，探尋夢境，並找回記憶。多樣的謎題妙趣橫生，讓你意猶未盡。

■ 前所未有的分屏式體驗
你將有機會探尋Robert Hill在心理健康中心裡的經歷，而全新的分屏模式也會帶給你一個嶄新的體驗。

■ 極具代入感的氛圍
精神衛生中心每天的氣氛變幻莫測，懸念叢生，讓你沉浸在詭譎疊起的情節裡不能自拔。

■ 身臨其境般的音效
由Victor Butzelaar製作的主題曲和音效讓你身臨其境。

■ 特別成就
The White Door會留下很多尚待揭曉的懸念。

mo.description:
艾蘭德（Eilander）家族中的長子——雅各布（Jakob）在母親去世後回到了天堂島。自從母親離奇死亡後，這座島嶼彷彿被十災詛咒了。一起來尋找母親的隱藏記憶，參加離奇的家族儀式，阻止災禍的發生！

《鏽湖：天堂島》是由創作了《方塊逃脫》系列、《鏽湖旅館》和《鏽湖根源》的鏽湖推出的第三個點選式冒險遊戲。

遊戲特性：

遊戲容易上手：易於上手卻讓你愛不釋手
獨特的故事情節：首個基於埃及十災的冒險遊戲
一玩難忘的解謎遊戲體驗：每一場災禍都有獨特的風格、懸念及充滿鏽湖特色的燒腦謎題
令人激動的畫面設計：由荷蘭畫家約翰·赦夫特（Johan Scherft）手繪的粉筆畫背景
超有畫面感的遊戲音樂：每場災禍都有自己的主題曲和變奏曲
成就：島上還有更多的秘密等你揭開

我們會一步一步揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網 RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的微博 @RustyLake_official

mo.releaseNotes: - 修復了使用庫存後 UI 停止響應的問題。
mo.description:
***注意：Don`t Starve需要iOS 8和至少iPhone 5、iPad 3或iPad mini 2。由於記憶體限制，它無法在更早的裝置上執行。***

Don`t Starve: Pocket Edition行動版將深受超過4百萬玩家喜愛的熱門PC遊戲移植到了iPhone和iPad平台。現在你可以隨時隨地進入充滿科學和魔法元素的世界，體驗原汁原味的荒野生存遊戲！

你扮演威爾遜，一位被困住並傳送到神秘荒野世界的勇敢無畏的紳士科學家。如果威爾遜希望逃出生天並找到回家的路，他必須充分利用所處的環境及這裡的各種生物。

進入一個光怪陸離而未經探索的世界，這裡充滿了奇怪的生物以及形形色色的危險和意外。收集資源以製作符合你的生存風格的物品和建築。一路解開這塊奇怪大陸上的各種謎團。

********************************************************

獎項：
- 獨立遊戲節：大獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：優秀設計獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：玩家選擇獎提名
 - Capsule Computers：編輯選擇獎
 - Indie Game Reviewer：年度最佳遊戲

主要特色：

針對觸控操作進行優化：新的直觀觸控介面讓你可以輕鬆探索、戰鬥、合成和管理物品。

原汁原味的生存和世界探索體驗：沒有說明。沒有幫助。無需手持。從一無所有開始，為了生存而合成物品、捕獵、研究、耕種和戰鬥。

黑暗而異想天開的視覺效果：處於獨特3D世界中的2D人物和古怪生物。

隨機產生的新世界：想要新地圖？沒問題！你可以隨時產生一個不斷變化的全新世界，它憎恨你並想你死掉。

mo.releaseNotes: 感謝您遊玩 Rusty Lake: Roots！最新版本已修復了一些錯誤。
mo.description:
當詹姆斯·范德布姆在自己所繼承房子的花園裡種下一顆特殊的種子後，他的生活發生了遽變。在人生之樹上通過揭開畫像來擴展你的血緣關係。
《銹湖：根源》是由創作了密室逃脫系列銹湖旅館的銹湖公司開發的第二款付費點擊類冒險遊戲。

關鍵特徵：
操作簡單：容易上手，但一旦玩起來就停不下來。
獨一無二的故事情節：經歷遊戲角色們的人生始末，並建立你獨屬的家譜。
超過33個等級：目前為止最大規模的鏽湖遊戲，充滿了謎題。
懸念叢生的氛圍：在冷靜與黑暗時刻間的轉換。
身臨其境般的音效：每個等級都有特別設計的主題曲和變奏曲。
成就：家譜有更多的秘密等待揭示。
點擊/輕擊箭頭，使用拖拽或滑動等方式在遊戲環境中導航。某些物品可以拖動。通過輕擊/點擊與人們以及各種物品進行互動。選擇在你的清單中找到的物品，並輕擊屏幕上的某處來使用它們。

我們會一步一步揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網 RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的微博 @RustyLake_official

mo.releaseNotes:
The Past Within - 更新版本 

為了慶祝Rusty Lake迎來第九週年，我們在 Underground Blossom 以及 The Past Within in 兩款遊戲加點巧思，開發新的小遊戲。歡迎關注我們的平台，查看如何從The Past Within的過去和未來之間，解鎖這次的祕密小遊戲！

更新說明 

- 新的祕密：你可以從 Underground Blossom 最新的更新版本內，查找這款祕密小遊戲的存取方式！
- 修正一些小錯誤


感謝你們的支持！
mo.description:
備註：The Past Within 是一款雙人合作遊戲。雙方玩家皆須於各自的設備上備有此款遊戲（手機、平板或電腦）以及互相溝通的管道。與夥伴一起遊玩，或到官方Discord來找尋志同道合的夥伴吧！

自己一人是無法探索未來與過去的！快找朋友一同拼湊線索來解開Albert Vanderboom的謎團。和朋友互相交流自己所看見的世界，來幫助彼此解開謎題、探索不同的時空！

The Past Within 是首款雙人合作的 點擊式冒險遊戲，架構於Rusty Lake的神祕世界中。

特色

▪ 達到雙人合作的經驗 
與朋友一起遊玩，一位探索過去，一位開發未來。一同合作來解開謎團，幫助Rose啟動她父親的計畫！
▪ 兩個世界 - 兩種視角 
兩位玩家將會以不同的層面去探索各自的世界。既有2D也有3D呈現 - 一種從未存在於 Rusty Lake 世界觀的遊玩方式！
▪ 跨平台遊玩
只要能與夥伴互相溝通，你們即可於各自偏好的平台一同來進行遊戲，支援的系統有：Mac、PC以及Nintendo Switch！
▪ 遊玩時長＆可重複遊玩
此遊戲含有兩個篇章，平均遊玩時間約為２小時。若想全方面體驗此款遊戲，我們非常建議可以再以不同的視角遊玩一次。 此外！可透過重複遊玩來使用嶄新的視角去解開謎團。

mo.releaseNotes: 謝謝您遊玩Underground Blossom，我們在新的版本中修復了一些錯誤！
mo.description:
沉浸於Rusty Lake 所打造的地鐵內，在 Laura Vanderboom的生命及回憶中穿梭

探索在象徵著Laura過去與未來的站台之間。解開謎題，尋覓並搭上列車，揭曉Laura的人生經歷，幫助她理解這曲折的人生，逃離腐壞的內心

「Underground Blossom」是一款由 the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake 系列的創作者所新開發的點擊式冒險遊戲，
特色

▪ 於熟悉的設定裡找到新體驗
沉浸在Rusty Lake經典的點擊式謎題當中，扣人心弦的神祕故事外，當然還有更多謎題等著各位

▪ 本車將於多站停留
本次路線將於七處獨特的車站進行停留，各站特色皆展示了Laura Vanderboom的生活、回憶及潛在的未來。預計旅程時間為兩小時

▪ 聰明的你們知道該如何做
一如往常，各位將在各車站解開藏在意想不到之處的祕密，獲得成就之餘，或許還會意外發現什麼其他驚喜！

▪ 戴上耳機更沉浸其中
每一站皆有由Victor Butzelaar量身打造的氛圍音樂迎接各位，更棒的是，遊戲中還有由大提琴家Sebastiaan van Halsema所帶來的演奏，讓整個體驗更為豐富！

mo.releaseNotes: 感謝遊玩《Follow the Meaning》！你能找到新的隱藏成就嗎？
mo.description:
一封絕望的信件將Paul Trilby偵探召喚至一座奇特的島嶼小鎮，該小鎮被高牆分隔，並由醫院掌控。當地居民進入醫院後，卻是失去記憶後地回來。一個險惡的陰謀正在當地醞釀著。你能解開這個謎團的真相嗎？

運用你的智慧、好奇心和發散性思維，藉由當地居民的協助，一步步破解謎題。請記住，當地的流言中總藏有一絲真相

《Follow the Meaning》是一款受經典遊戲 Samorost與Rusty Lake系列啟發的超現實手繪點擊冒險遊戲

特色

■ 手繪美術帶你走進這個別具一格的世界
■ 奇異的世界觀下隱藏著險惡的氣息
■ 由Victor Butzelaar創作的氛圍音樂
■ 一個等待你細心挖掘的扭曲謎團
■ 平均遊戲時間：1.5 小時

mo.sellerName: Hangzhou Beesoft Information Technology Co., Ltd.
mo.releaseNotes:
Thanks for using ScanGo!

In this update: 
 Fixed some minor bugs and improved stability

We’d love to hear from you! If you have any ideas, suggestions, or feature requests for future versions, feel free to share them with us anytime.

Just drop us an email at: scango@beesoft.io
mo.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

mo.sellerName: Xiamen Daoqimao Network Technology Co., Ltd.
mo.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

mo.trackName: 石器情懷服歸來M-1秒找回20年情懷
mo.description:
勇士，歡迎踏入這片充滿遠古氣息的石器大陸！千年古龍從沉睡中蘇醒，蠻荒巨獸在荒野遊蕩，文明的火種與原始的力量在此碰撞交織。曾經守護大陸的秩序已然鬆動，而你，將從這片土地的起點出發，帶著對未知的好奇與對強者的渴望，踏上一場跨越山川湖海的勇者征途。​

在這裡，你會見證晨光中的原始部落，穿越迷霧籠罩的古龍巢穴，在一次次戰鬥中突破自我；你會邂逅並肩作戰的夥伴，收服忠誠可靠的寵物，在協作中攻克看似不可戰勝的難關；你更會在掛機成長中穩步變強，在多元玩法中收穫樂趣，在家族同心中共築榮耀 —— 這片大陸的每一寸土地，都在等待你書寫專屬的獵龍傳奇。

◆ 遊戲特色 ◆

「多元夥伴」 與夥伴和寵物共戰 BOSS / 免費與召喚雙渠道獲取​
冒險的路上，可靠的夥伴與寵物從不缺席！在這篇神奇的大陸，養育了各種強大和擁有神奇熟悉的寵物，去馴服它們，和它們並肩作戰。每隻寵物都有不同的屬性，熱情好戰的火屬性戰寵；移動神速的風屬性神寵；不動如山的土屬性守護神；治癒親和的葉屬性夥伴；還有神秘莫測的機械戰寵。
無需氪金，透過主線任務、限時活動即可免費解鎖實用夥伴；強力戰寵也能透過野外捕獲、日常活動輕鬆獲取，陪你探索大陸奧秘。若想擁有稀有夥伴與遠古戰寵，召喚系統為你開啟可能：最強夥伴菲尼、神話神寵酷比等強力存在，將以獨特技能為你的戰鬥助力，協同作戰讓獵龍更從容。
​
「豐富玩法」 告別單一戰鬥模式 / 暢享多元獵龍樂趣​
掛機戰鬥之外，更多趣味玩法等你來解鎖！競技場中，與全服獵龍者同臺競技，憑藉戰力爭奪排名，贏取專屬獎勵；狩獵場裡，直面咆哮的古龍與巨型巨獸，成功擊敗即可獲取珍稀素材，升級強力裝備；特色副本囊括各類升級材料，還有難度逐步提升的挑戰，滿足你的探索欲；跨服活動更匯聚各區精英，組隊挑戰跨服 BOSS、參與跨服團戰，在團隊協作中感受熱血與激情。​

「家族同心」 共築獵龍榮耀 / 攜手同行更顯溫暖​
加入家族，從此獵龍之路不再孤單！與族員完成家族任務，共建家族莊園，享受集體勞動的成果；定期開啟家族 BOSS 挑戰，組隊直面強大 BOSS，同心協力擊敗後人人可分豐厚獎勵；熱血家族戰如約而至，與其他家族爭奪大陸霸權，贏取家族榮譽與全族福利；家族副本更需全員協作，在配合中攻克難關，凝聚家族情誼，共同書寫屬於你們的家族獵龍傳奇。​

「海量福利」 助力獵龍啟程 / 登錄即享重磅權益​
無需繁瑣積累，福利從啟程便一路相伴！登錄遊戲即刻解鎖 VIP5 特權，專屬屬性加成、珍稀道具領取權限同步開啟；每日簽到禮包從不缺席，遊戲代幣和強化材料輕鬆收入囊中；更有全服通關慶典禮 —— 當全服玩家共同突破關鍵副本，人人可領豐厚獎勵；區服首通專屬嘉獎同步上線，讓你從開始就領先一步。​

「掛機成長」 解鎖無限獵龍征途 / 離線也能穩步變強​
這是一場無需「肝度」的輕鬆征程！遊戲主打掛機類戰鬥模式，無論你是忙碌通勤還是休憩放鬆，角色都會自動探索戰場、擊敗對手，持續積累經驗與戰力。從初出茅廬的新手玩家，到能與 BOSS 抗衡的傳奇強者，等級提升、技能解鎖、裝備強化全不耽誤，離線收益即時累積，讓你隨時回歸都能感受成長的喜悅，無限獵龍之路永不停止。​

mo.description:
Henry was the lead animator at Joey Drew Studios in its 1930s heyday, a studio that was best known for producing animated cartoons of their most popular and beloved character, Bendy. Many years later Henry receives a mysterious invitation from Joey Drew himself to return to the old cartoon workshop. Journey deep into the sketchy madness of this twisted cartoon nightmare. 

Fight the darkness. Escape the Ink Demon. Fear the Machine.

• Varied Game Play! - First person combat, horror, puzzles, stealth and numerous hidden secrets.
• A Beautiful Cartoon World! - Lovingly crafted by a small indie studio.
• A Global Bendy Community! - Delve deep into the mystery and join the discussion at joeydrewstudios.com

mo.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

mo.description:
勇士，歡迎踏入這片充滿遠古氣息的石器大陸！千年古龍從沉睡中蘇醒，蠻荒巨獸在荒野遊蕩，文明的火種與原始的力量在此碰撞交織。曾經守護大陸的秩序已然鬆動，而你，將從這片土地的起點出發，帶著對未知的好奇與對強者的渴望，踏上一場跨越山川湖海的勇者征途。​

在這裡，你會見證晨光中的原始部落，穿越迷霧籠罩的古龍巢穴，在一次次戰鬥中突破自我；你會邂逅並肩作戰的夥伴，收服忠誠可靠的寵物，在協作中攻克看似不可戰勝的難關；你更會在掛機成長中穩步變強，在多元玩法中收穫樂趣，在家族同心中共築榮耀 —— 這片大陸的每一寸土地，都在等待你書寫專屬的獵龍傳奇。

無需氪金，透過主線任務、限時活動即可免費解鎖實用夥伴；強力戰寵也能透過野外捕獲、日常活動輕鬆獲取，陪你探索大陸奧秘。若想擁有稀有夥伴與遠古戰寵，召喚系統為你開啟可能：最強夥伴菲尼、神話神寵酷比等強力存在，將以獨特技能為你的戰鬥助力，協同作戰讓獵龍更從容。
​

無需繁瑣積累，福利從啟程便一路相伴！登錄遊戲即刻解鎖 VIP5 特權，專屬屬性加成、珍稀道具領取權限同步開啟；每日簽到禮包從不缺席，遊戲代幣和強化材料輕鬆收入囊中；更有全服通關慶典禮 —— 當全服玩家共同突破關鍵副本，人人可領豐厚獎勵；區服首通專屬嘉獎同步上線，讓你從開始就領先一步。​

這是一場無需「肝度」的輕鬆征程！遊戲主打掛機類戰鬥模式，無論你是忙碌通勤還是休憩放鬆，角色都會自動探索戰場、擊敗對手，持續積累經驗與戰力。從初出茅廬的新手玩家，到能與 BOSS 抗衡的傳奇強者，等級提升、技能解鎖、裝備強化全不耽誤，離線收益即時累積，讓你隨時回歸都能感受成長的喜悅，無限獵龍之路永不停止。​

mo.description:
這是一款革新式的Roguelite遊戲：
◆ “卡牌構築×戰棋”深度融合的獨特玩法。
◆ 獨創的多牌同出玩法帶來新鮮體驗。



作為硬核向的策略遊戲，《魔卡棋旅》有：
◆ 隨機生成的戰鬥場景和地圖節點，帶來了豐富的戰鬥體驗。
◆ 6個獨特的職業，每個職業的構築玩法都是獨一無二的。
◆ 300+張卡牌和100+種秘寶與道具，每一局遊戲都是全新的驚奇冒險！
◆ 多周目層層遞進的難度挑戰。
◆ 碎片化程序儲存技術，隨時隨地玩幾下或是持續玩夠一局90分鐘的冒險全都可以！

mo.description:
《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是由《銀河歷險記》(Samorost)和《植物精靈》(Botanicula)的製作者開發的屢獲殊榮的獨立冒險遊戲。

《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是一個完整長度的冒險遊戲。玩家將扮演一個流亡到垃圾堆的小機器人，從廢料場返回城市，並打敗壞人黑帽兄弟，拯救他的機器人女友。玩家需要使用邏輯、收集重要資訊及物品，來解決各式難題，才可以拯救機器人女友。快一起和可愛的小機器人，解開重重的謎團吧！

絕對好玩 - TouchArcade
4/4 - USA TODAY
4/4 - SlideToPlay
9/10 - Pocket Gamer

獎項：
- IGF，卓越視覺藝術獎
- Gamasutra，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎
- VGChartz.com，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎

mo.releaseNotes:
V 1.021_I41
- Item Pack #33, featuring 14 new items all coming from the videogame world, such as the critically acclaimed Grand Thief Scooter to the rising star of the indie industry, Spardew Valley!
- Various improvements and bug fixes have now been implemented to make your business ventures even better!
mo.description:
Have you ever thought about building up your own empire, without the risk of ending up sleeping under a bridge? Become the owner of a pawn shop and haggle like your life depends on it!

Start small, grow big!
Begin your journey in a rundown shack and build up your business day by day by negotiating with customers, hiring employees and partaking in auctions.
But be careful! Scammers will try to take advantage of you with fake items and if someone ever wants to sell you a questionable “insurance” better choose your next words wisely...
Each customer behaves differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits. It’s up to you to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them and how to seal the deal!
Use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire!

Dealer’s Life 2 Main Features
- The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
- A myriad of items to buy and sell with fake items to avoid (or exploit!)
- Infinite customers to haggle with, each with their own personality and appearance
- Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others.
- Auctions! For times when you crave a little bit of extra adrenaline... aaand SOLD!
- Loads of jokes and quotes from cult movies and video games

Your favorite pawn shop experience is finally getting a sequel! Haggle like your life depends on it in this funny tycoon game. You never know what is gonna stumble through that door!

advisories: 偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.releaseNotes:
V. 1.28_I29
- Performance improvements: we updated the game engine (Unity) to a newer version and we did a performance check, the game should now run even smoother!
mo.description:
Dealer's Life is a funny tycoon game where you manage your own pawn shop. Haggle with infinite generated customers to buy and sell infinite generated items!
Have fun for hours and use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire! Thanks to procedural generation, special characters and random events you’ll never know what’s coming next!

Dealer’s Life main features:
• Infinite items to buy and sell, all procedurally generated, with fake and counterfeit items to avoid (or exploit!)
• Infinite customers to haggle with, each with his own personality and appearance, all procedurally generated. Will you manage to recognize their personality only by looking at them?
• The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
• Be the smartest and quickest bidder and beat your rivals to buy prestigious items in exciting auctions!
• Customize your character’s skills and play different games depending on what you decide to increase, finding the game style that suits you most
• Manage your pawn shop’s features: keep track of your inventory, position in town, maximum number of customers per day and many more
• Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others. Buy, repair, estimate and resell for huge gain!
• Random events, recurrent characters and different game endings will make every game a unique experience!
• Lots of humour and quotes from cult movies and videogames

Thousands of unique customers, with unique behaviors and traits: they all behave differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits which are reflected on their appearance. It’s up to you, with the help of your character Insight skill, to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them, when to push and when you will have to just accept their offer.

Try to amass enough money to transfer to a new pawn shop with a better look and better city placement: your daily number of customers will surely grow! And keep your inventory full of items, collecting legendary items to attract even more customers!

Fight the market to become the best trader out there and live the ultimate pawn shop experience with Dealer’s Life!

We are constantly improving the game, if you have any feedback about the game, your experience or anything else have a look at our Roadmap ( https://trello.com/b/nAAmRDHM ) and contact us through our social media pages:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DealersLife
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/DealersLife

「海量福利」 助力獵龍啟程 / 登錄即享重磅權益​
無需繁瑣積累，福利從啟程便一路相伴！登錄遊戲即刻解鎖 VIP5 特權，專屬屬性加成、珍稀道具領取權限同步開啟；每日簽到禮包從不缺席，遊戲代幣和強化材料輕鬆收入囊中；更有全服通關慶典禮 —— 當全服玩家共同突破關鍵副本，人人可領豐厚獎勵；區服首通專屬嘉獎同步上線，讓你從開始就領先一步。​

「掛機成長」 解鎖無限獵龍征途 / 離線也能穩步變強​
這是一場無需「肝度」的輕鬆征程！遊戲主打掛機類戰鬥模式，無論你是忙碌通勤還是休憩放鬆，角色都會自動探索戰場、擊敗對手，持續積累經驗與戰力。從初出茅廬的新手玩家，到能與 BOSS 抗衡的傳奇強者，等級提升、技能解鎖、裝備強化全不耽誤，離線收益即時累積，讓你隨時回歸都能感受成長的喜悅，無限獵龍之路永不停止。​

tw.description:
歡迎我們的客人蒞臨鏽湖旅館，並確保他們在此過得愉快。本週將有5頓晚餐，確保每頓晚餐都值得讓他們為之獻身！

《鏽湖旅館》是一款獨特的益智遊戲，它離奇古怪的場景設置靈感源自於大衛‧林區的電視連續劇《雙峰》。

主要特點：

操作簡單：容易上手，但一玩起來就停不下來。
無數的謎題：共有6個房間，充滿了各式各樣又獨特的腦力激盪。
驚悚而動人的故事：將會有5次伴有有趣的客人和員工們的用餐。
懸念叢生的氛圍：鏽湖旅館是一個超現實的地方，在這裡任何事情都有可能發生……
令人印象深刻的配樂：每個房間都有專屬設計的主題曲。
成就：一個你從未見過的空前走廊。

我們會一步一步地揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的Facebook @rustylakecom

tw.description:
Klei Entertainment與《超級兄弟：劍與巫術》、《超時空戰隊》和《Below》（深入地下）的開發商CAPY攜手合作，為《饑荒》的粉絲們奉上最新的單人遊戲資料片：《饑荒：海難》！

在《饑荒：海難》中，威爾遜發現自己被困在了一個熱帶群島中。在全新的環境中，迎接他的是新的生物、生物群落及季節，他必須學會適應這一切才能逃出生天。

千萬不要因為熱帶微風的吹拂而萌生性命無憂的錯覺，形勢可能急轉直下，但這依然是殘酷的環境與玩家的不妥協之間的一場較量。你很快便會發現，島嶼上充滿凶險，殺機四伏。

主要功能

在茫茫大海中前行：打造一艘船，然後揚帆開啟探險之旅！

探索新世界：世界大不同。探索充滿著新資源的全新生物群落。搜尋新的食物來源。利用眾多新生物維生。

應對全新的季節挑戰：熱帶地區的一系列季節挑戰勢要將你置於死地。

打造全新配方：打造一系列新工具，努力克服島上的惡劣環境並生存下去。

tw.description:
在一所心理健康中心裡醒來的Robert Hill罹患了嚴重的失憶症。他需要每天遵循嚴格的作息時間，通過探索自己的夢境來找回記憶。

The White Door是一款由方塊逃脫和鏽湖系列遊戲的開發者製作的指向與點擊式冒險遊戲。

關鍵特徵:

■ 操作簡單
容易上手，但一旦玩起來就停不下來

■ 獨特的故事線
每天恪守嚴格的作息時間，探尋夢境，並找回記憶。多樣的謎題妙趣橫生，讓你意猶未盡。

■ 前所未有的分屏式體驗
你將有機會探尋Robert Hill在心理健康中心裡的經歷，而全新的分屏模式也會帶給你一個嶄新的體驗。

■ 極具代入感的氛圍
精神衛生中心每天的氣氛變幻莫測，懸念叢生，讓你沉浸在詭譎疊起的情節裡不能自拔。

■ 身臨其境般的音效
由Victor Butzelaar製作的主題曲和音效讓你身臨其境。

■ 特別成就
The White Door會留下很多尚待揭曉的懸念。

tw.description:
艾蘭德（Eilander）家族中的長子——雅各布（Jakob）在母親去世後回到了天堂島。自從母親離奇死亡後，這座島嶼彷彿被十災詛咒了。一起來尋找母親的隱藏記憶，參加離奇的家族儀式，阻止災禍的發生！

《鏽湖：天堂島》是由創作了《方塊逃脫》系列、《鏽湖旅館》和《鏽湖根源》的鏽湖推出的第三個點選式冒險遊戲。

遊戲特性：

遊戲容易上手：易於上手卻讓你愛不釋手
獨特的故事情節：首個基於埃及十災的冒險遊戲
一玩難忘的解謎遊戲體驗：每一場災禍都有獨特的風格、懸念及充滿鏽湖特色的燒腦謎題
令人激動的畫面設計：由荷蘭畫家約翰·赦夫特（Johan Scherft）手繪的粉筆畫背景
超有畫面感的遊戲音樂：每場災禍都有自己的主題曲和變奏曲
成就：島上還有更多的秘密等你揭開

我們會一步一步揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網 RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的微博 @RustyLake_official

tw.description:
***注意：Don`t Starve需要iOS 8和至少iPhone 5、iPad 3或iPad mini 2。由於記憶體限制，它無法在更早的裝置上執行。***

Don`t Starve: Pocket Edition行動版將深受超過4百萬玩家喜愛的熱門PC遊戲移植到了iPhone和iPad平台。現在你可以隨時隨地進入充滿科學和魔法元素的世界，體驗原汁原味的荒野生存遊戲！

你扮演威爾遜，一位被困住並傳送到神秘荒野世界的勇敢無畏的紳士科學家。如果威爾遜希望逃出生天並找到回家的路，他必須充分利用所處的環境及這裡的各種生物。

進入一個光怪陸離而未經探索的世界，這裡充滿了奇怪的生物以及形形色色的危險和意外。收集資源以製作符合你的生存風格的物品和建築。一路解開這塊奇怪大陸上的各種謎團。

********************************************************

獎項：
- 獨立遊戲節：大獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：優秀設計獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：玩家選擇獎提名
 - Capsule Computers：編輯選擇獎
 - Indie Game Reviewer：年度最佳遊戲

主要特色：

針對觸控操作進行優化：新的直觀觸控介面讓你可以輕鬆探索、戰鬥、合成和管理物品。

原汁原味的生存和世界探索體驗：沒有說明。沒有幫助。無需手持。從一無所有開始，為了生存而合成物品、捕獵、研究、耕種和戰鬥。

黑暗而異想天開的視覺效果：處於獨特3D世界中的2D人物和古怪生物。

隨機產生的新世界：想要新地圖？沒問題！你可以隨時產生一個不斷變化的全新世界，它憎恨你並想你死掉。

tw.description:
當詹姆斯·范德布姆在自己所繼承房子的花園裡種下一顆特殊的種子後，他的生活發生了遽變。在人生之樹上通過揭開畫像來擴展你的血緣關係。
《銹湖：根源》是由創作了密室逃脫系列銹湖旅館的銹湖公司開發的第二款付費點擊類冒險遊戲。

關鍵特徵：
操作簡單：容易上手，但一旦玩起來就停不下來。
獨一無二的故事情節：經歷遊戲角色們的人生始末，並建立你獨屬的家譜。
超過33個等級：目前為止最大規模的鏽湖遊戲，充滿了謎題。
懸念叢生的氛圍：在冷靜與黑暗時刻間的轉換。
身臨其境般的音效：每個等級都有特別設計的主題曲和變奏曲。
成就：家譜有更多的秘密等待揭示。
點擊/輕擊箭頭，使用拖拽或滑動等方式在遊戲環境中導航。某些物品可以拖動。通過輕擊/點擊與人們以及各種物品進行互動。選擇在你的清單中找到的物品，並輕擊屏幕上的某處來使用它們。

The Past Within - 更新版本 

為了慶祝Rusty Lake迎來第九週年，我們在 Underground Blossom 以及 The Past Within in 兩款遊戲加點巧思，開發新的小遊戲。歡迎關注我們的平台，查看如何從The Past Within的過去和未來之間，解鎖這次的祕密小遊戲！

更新說明 

- 新的祕密：你可以從 Underground Blossom 最新的更新版本內，查找這款祕密小遊戲的存取方式！

tw.description:
備註：The Past Within 是一款雙人合作遊戲。雙方玩家皆須於各自的設備上備有此款遊戲（手機、平板或電腦）以及互相溝通的管道。與夥伴一起遊玩，或到官方Discord來找尋志同道合的夥伴吧！

自己一人是無法探索未來與過去的！快找朋友一同拼湊線索來解開Albert Vanderboom的謎團。和朋友互相交流自己所看見的世界，來幫助彼此解開謎題、探索不同的時空！

The Past Within 是首款雙人合作的 點擊式冒險遊戲，架構於Rusty Lake的神祕世界中。

特色

▪ 達到雙人合作的經驗 
與朋友一起遊玩，一位探索過去，一位開發未來。一同合作來解開謎團，幫助Rose啟動她父親的計畫！
▪ 兩個世界 - 兩種視角 
兩位玩家將會以不同的層面去探索各自的世界。既有2D也有3D呈現 - 一種從未存在於 Rusty Lake 世界觀的遊玩方式！
▪ 跨平台遊玩
只要能與夥伴互相溝通，你們即可於各自偏好的平台一同來進行遊戲，支援的系統有：Mac、PC以及Nintendo Switch！
▪ 遊玩時長＆可重複遊玩
此遊戲含有兩個篇章，平均遊玩時間約為２小時。若想全方面體驗此款遊戲，我們非常建議可以再以不同的視角遊玩一次。 此外！可透過重複遊玩來使用嶄新的視角去解開謎團。

tw.description:
沉浸於Rusty Lake 所打造的地鐵內，在 Laura Vanderboom的生命及回憶中穿梭

探索在象徵著Laura過去與未來的站台之間。解開謎題，尋覓並搭上列車，揭曉Laura的人生經歷，幫助她理解這曲折的人生，逃離腐壞的內心

「Underground Blossom」是一款由 the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake 系列的創作者所新開發的點擊式冒險遊戲，
特色

▪ 於熟悉的設定裡找到新體驗
沉浸在Rusty Lake經典的點擊式謎題當中，扣人心弦的神祕故事外，當然還有更多謎題等著各位

▪ 本車將於多站停留
本次路線將於七處獨特的車站進行停留，各站特色皆展示了Laura Vanderboom的生活、回憶及潛在的未來。預計旅程時間為兩小時

▪ 聰明的你們知道該如何做
一如往常，各位將在各車站解開藏在意想不到之處的祕密，獲得成就之餘，或許還會意外發現什麼其他驚喜！

▪ 戴上耳機更沉浸其中
每一站皆有由Victor Butzelaar量身打造的氛圍音樂迎接各位，更棒的是，遊戲中還有由大提琴家Sebastiaan van Halsema所帶來的演奏，讓整個體驗更為豐富！

tw.releaseNotes: 感謝遊玩《Follow the Meaning》！你能找到新的隱藏成就嗎？
tw.description:
一封絕望的信件將Paul Trilby偵探召喚至一座奇特的島嶼小鎮，該小鎮被高牆分隔，並由醫院掌控。當地居民進入醫院後，卻是失去記憶後地回來。一個險惡的陰謀正在當地醞釀著。你能解開這個謎團的真相嗎？

運用你的智慧、好奇心和發散性思維，藉由當地居民的協助，一步步破解謎題。請記住，當地的流言中總藏有一絲真相

《Follow the Meaning》是一款受經典遊戲 Samorost與Rusty Lake系列啟發的超現實手繪點擊冒險遊戲

特色

■ 手繪美術帶你走進這個別具一格的世界
■ 奇異的世界觀下隱藏著險惡的氣息
■ 由Victor Butzelaar創作的氛圍音樂
■ 一個等待你細心挖掘的扭曲謎團
■ 平均遊戲時間：1.5 小時

tw.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

tw.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

tw.trackName: 石器情懷服歸來M-1秒找回20年情懷
tw.description:
勇士，歡迎踏入這片充滿遠古氣息的石器大陸！千年古龍從沉睡中蘇醒，蠻荒巨獸在荒野遊蕩，文明的火種與原始的力量在此碰撞交織。曾經守護大陸的秩序已然鬆動，而你，將從這片土地的起點出發，帶著對未知的好奇與對強者的渴望，踏上一場跨越山川湖海的勇者征途。​

在這裡，你會見證晨光中的原始部落，穿越迷霧籠罩的古龍巢穴，在一次次戰鬥中突破自我；你會邂逅並肩作戰的夥伴，收服忠誠可靠的寵物，在協作中攻克看似不可戰勝的難關；你更會在掛機成長中穩步變強，在多元玩法中收穫樂趣，在家族同心中共築榮耀 —— 這片大陸的每一寸土地，都在等待你書寫專屬的獵龍傳奇。

◆ 遊戲特色 ◆

「多元夥伴」 與夥伴和寵物共戰 BOSS / 免費與召喚雙渠道獲取​
冒險的路上，可靠的夥伴與寵物從不缺席！在這篇神奇的大陸，養育了各種強大和擁有神奇熟悉的寵物，去馴服它們，和它們並肩作戰。每隻寵物都有不同的屬性，熱情好戰的火屬性戰寵；移動神速的風屬性神寵；不動如山的土屬性守護神；治癒親和的葉屬性夥伴；還有神秘莫測的機械戰寵。
無需氪金，透過主線任務、限時活動即可免費解鎖實用夥伴；強力戰寵也能透過野外捕獲、日常活動輕鬆獲取，陪你探索大陸奧秘。若想擁有稀有夥伴與遠古戰寵，召喚系統為你開啟可能：最強夥伴菲尼、神話神寵酷比等強力存在，將以獨特技能為你的戰鬥助力，協同作戰讓獵龍更從容。
​
「豐富玩法」 告別單一戰鬥模式 / 暢享多元獵龍樂趣​
掛機戰鬥之外，更多趣味玩法等你來解鎖！競技場中，與全服獵龍者同臺競技，憑藉戰力爭奪排名，贏取專屬獎勵；狩獵場裡，直面咆哮的古龍與巨型巨獸，成功擊敗即可獲取珍稀素材，升級強力裝備；特色副本囊括各類升級材料，還有難度逐步提升的挑戰，滿足你的探索欲；跨服活動更匯聚各區精英，組隊挑戰跨服 BOSS、參與跨服團戰，在團隊協作中感受熱血與激情。​

「家族同心」 共築獵龍榮耀 / 攜手同行更顯溫暖​
加入家族，從此獵龍之路不再孤單！與族員完成家族任務，共建家族莊園，享受集體勞動的成果；定期開啟家族 BOSS 挑戰，組隊直面強大 BOSS，同心協力擊敗後人人可分豐厚獎勵；熱血家族戰如約而至，與其他家族爭奪大陸霸權，贏取家族榮譽與全族福利；家族副本更需全員協作，在配合中攻克難關，凝聚家族情誼，共同書寫屬於你們的家族獵龍傳奇。​

「海量福利」 助力獵龍啟程 / 登錄即享重磅權益​
無需繁瑣積累，福利從啟程便一路相伴！登錄遊戲即刻解鎖 VIP5 特權，專屬屬性加成、珍稀道具領取權限同步開啟；每日簽到禮包從不缺席，遊戲代幣和強化材料輕鬆收入囊中；更有全服通關慶典禮 —— 當全服玩家共同突破關鍵副本，人人可領豐厚獎勵；區服首通專屬嘉獎同步上線，讓你從開始就領先一步。​

「掛機成長」 解鎖無限獵龍征途 / 離線也能穩步變強​
這是一場無需「肝度」的輕鬆征程！遊戲主打掛機類戰鬥模式，無論你是忙碌通勤還是休憩放鬆，角色都會自動探索戰場、擊敗對手，持續積累經驗與戰力。從初出茅廬的新手玩家，到能與 BOSS 抗衡的傳奇強者，等級提升、技能解鎖、裝備強化全不耽誤，離線收益即時累積，讓你隨時回歸都能感受成長的喜悅，無限獵龍之路永不停止。​

advisories: 頻繁/強烈的驚悚/恐怖題材

tw.description:
Henry was the lead animator at Joey Drew Studios in its 1930s heyday, a studio that was best known for producing animated cartoons of their most popular and beloved character, Bendy. Many years later Henry receives a mysterious invitation from Joey Drew himself to return to the old cartoon workshop. Journey deep into the sketchy madness of this twisted cartoon nightmare. 

Fight the darkness. Escape the Ink Demon. Fear the Machine.

• Varied Game Play! - First person combat, horror, puzzles, stealth and numerous hidden secrets.
• A Beautiful Cartoon World! - Lovingly crafted by a small indie studio.
• A Global Bendy Community! - Delve deep into the mystery and join the discussion at joeydrewstudios.com

tw.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

tw.trackCensoredName: 石器情懷服歸來M-1秒找回20年情懷

tw.trackCensoredName: 石器情懷服歸來M-1秒找回20年情懷
tw.description:
勇士，歡迎踏入這片充滿遠古氣息的石器大陸！千年古龍從沉睡中蘇醒，蠻荒巨獸在荒野遊蕩，文明的火種與原始的力量在此碰撞交織。曾經守護大陸的秩序已然鬆動，而你，將從這片土地的起點出發，帶著對未知的好奇與對強者的渴望，踏上一場跨越山川湖海的勇者征途。​

在這裡，你會見證晨光中的原始部落，穿越迷霧籠罩的古龍巢穴，在一次次戰鬥中突破自我；你會邂逅並肩作戰的夥伴，收服忠誠可靠的寵物，在協作中攻克看似不可戰勝的難關；你更會在掛機成長中穩步變強，在多元玩法中收穫樂趣，在家族同心中共築榮耀 —— 這片大陸的每一寸土地，都在等待你書寫專屬的獵龍傳奇。

◆ 遊戲特色 ◆

「多元夥伴」 與夥伴和寵物共戰 BOSS / 免費與召喚雙渠道獲取​
冒險的路上，可靠的夥伴與寵物從不缺席！在這篇神奇的大陸，養育了各種強大和擁有神奇熟悉的寵物，去馴服它們，和它們並肩作戰。每隻寵物都有不同的屬性，熱情好戰的火屬性戰寵；移動神速的風屬性神寵；不動如山的土屬性守護神；治癒親和的葉屬性夥伴；還有神秘莫測的機械戰寵。
無需氪金，透過主線任務、限時活動即可免費解鎖實用夥伴；強力戰寵也能透過野外捕獲、日常活動輕鬆獲取，陪你探索大陸奧秘。若想擁有稀有夥伴與遠古戰寵，召喚系統為你開啟可能：最強夥伴菲尼、神話神寵酷比等強力存在，將以獨特技能為你的戰鬥助力，協同作戰讓獵龍更從容。
​
「豐富玩法」 告別單一戰鬥模式 / 暢享多元獵龍樂趣​
掛機戰鬥之外，更多趣味玩法等你來解鎖！競技場中，與全服獵龍者同臺競技，憑藉戰力爭奪排名，贏取專屬獎勵；狩獵場裡，直面咆哮的古龍與巨型巨獸，成功擊敗即可獲取珍稀素材，升級強力裝備；特色副本囊括各類升級材料，還有難度逐步提升的挑戰，滿足你的探索欲；跨服活動更匯聚各區精英，組隊挑戰跨服 BOSS、參與跨服團戰，在團隊協作中感受熱血與激情。​

「家族同心」 共築獵龍榮耀 / 攜手同行更顯溫暖​
加入家族，從此獵龍之路不再孤單！與族員完成家族任務，共建家族莊園，享受集體勞動的成果；定期開啟家族 BOSS 挑戰，組隊直面強大 BOSS，同心協力擊敗後人人可分豐厚獎勵；熱血家族戰如約而至，與其他家族爭奪大陸霸權，贏取家族榮譽與全族福利；家族副本更需全員協作，在配合中攻克難關，凝聚家族情誼，共同書寫屬於你們的家族獵龍傳奇。​

「海量福利」 助力獵龍啟程 / 登錄即享重磅權益​
無需繁瑣積累，福利從啟程便一路相伴！登錄遊戲即刻解鎖 VIP5 特權，專屬屬性加成、珍稀道具領取權限同步開啟；每日簽到禮包從不缺席，遊戲代幣和強化材料輕鬆收入囊中；更有全服通關慶典禮 —— 當全服玩家共同突破關鍵副本，人人可領豐厚獎勵；區服首通專屬嘉獎同步上線，讓你從開始就領先一步。​

「掛機成長」 解鎖無限獵龍征途 / 離線也能穩步變強​
這是一場無需「肝度」的輕鬆征程！遊戲主打掛機類戰鬥模式，無論你是忙碌通勤還是休憩放鬆，角色都會自動探索戰場、擊敗對手，持續積累經驗與戰力。從初出茅廬的新手玩家，到能與 BOSS 抗衡的傳奇強者，等級提升、技能解鎖、裝備強化全不耽誤，離線收益即時累積，讓你隨時回歸都能感受成長的喜悅，無限獵龍之路永不停止。​

tw.trackName: 荒島物語100天 - 單人無人島生存遊戲
tw.description:
你在一場船難後，孤身漂流至一座神秘的熱帶荒島。
在這裡，生存是唯一目標。搭建庇護所、製作工具、尋找食物與水源，並深入探索島上隱藏的秘密！

■ 簡單操作
• 點擊即可移動和收集資源。

■ 生存挑戰
• 僅靠野果無法完全填飽肚子。
• 透過小遊戲捕魚，製作陷阱捕捉獵物，獲取珍貴的肉類資源。

■ 健康模擬系統
• 維持健康並不容易。
• 健康系統包含：體重、傷口、飢餓、口渴、精力、體溫，乃至蚊蟲叮咬…

■ 建造與升級
• 收集材料製作工具和家具，解鎖新工具和料理。

■ 多變的天氣系統
• 不同的天氣會限制你的行動，可能打亂你一整天的計畫。

■ 自給自足的田園生活
• 掌握種植作物與飼養山羊的訣竅，自己製作麵包。

■ 放鬆
• 自然白噪音。

---------

tw.description:
Have you ever thought about building up your own empire, without the risk of ending up sleeping under a bridge? Become the owner of a pawn shop and haggle like your life depends on it!

Start small, grow big!
Begin your journey in a rundown shack and build up your business day by day by negotiating with customers, hiring employees and partaking in auctions.
But be careful! Scammers will try to take advantage of you with fake items and if someone ever wants to sell you a questionable “insurance” better choose your next words wisely...
Each customer behaves differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits. It’s up to you to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them and how to seal the deal!
Use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire!

Dealer’s Life 2 Main Features
- The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
- A myriad of items to buy and sell with fake items to avoid (or exploit!)
- Infinite customers to haggle with, each with their own personality and appearance
- Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others.
- Auctions! For times when you crave a little bit of extra adrenaline... aaand SOLD!
- Loads of jokes and quotes from cult movies and video games

Your favorite pawn shop experience is finally getting a sequel! Haggle like your life depends on it in this funny tycoon game. You never know what is gonna stumble through that door!

tw.description:
Dealer's Life is a funny tycoon game where you manage your own pawn shop. Haggle with infinite generated customers to buy and sell infinite generated items!
Have fun for hours and use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire! Thanks to procedural generation, special characters and random events you’ll never know what’s coming next!

Dealer’s Life main features:
• Infinite items to buy and sell, all procedurally generated, with fake and counterfeit items to avoid (or exploit!)
• Infinite customers to haggle with, each with his own personality and appearance, all procedurally generated. Will you manage to recognize their personality only by looking at them?
• The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
• Be the smartest and quickest bidder and beat your rivals to buy prestigious items in exciting auctions!
• Customize your character’s skills and play different games depending on what you decide to increase, finding the game style that suits you most
• Manage your pawn shop’s features: keep track of your inventory, position in town, maximum number of customers per day and many more
• Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others. Buy, repair, estimate and resell for huge gain!
• Random events, recurrent characters and different game endings will make every game a unique experience!
• Lots of humour and quotes from cult movies and videogames

Thousands of unique customers, with unique behaviors and traits: they all behave differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits which are reflected on their appearance. It’s up to you, with the help of your character Insight skill, to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them, when to push and when you will have to just accept their offer.

Try to amass enough money to transfer to a new pawn shop with a better look and better city placement: your daily number of customers will surely grow! And keep your inventory full of items, collecting legendary items to attract even more customers!

Fight the market to become the best trader out there and live the ultimate pawn shop experience with Dealer’s Life!

We are constantly improving the game, if you have any feedback about the game, your experience or anything else have a look at our Roadmap ( https://trello.com/b/nAAmRDHM ) and contact us through our social media pages:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DealersLife
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/DealersLife

us.description:
Henry was the lead animator at Joey Drew Studios in its 1930s heyday, a studio that was best known for producing animated cartoons of their most popular and beloved character, Bendy. Many years later Henry receives a mysterious invitation from Joey Drew himself to return to the old cartoon workshop. Journey deep into the sketchy madness of this twisted cartoon nightmare. 

Fight the darkness. Escape the Ink Demon. Fear the Machine.

• Varied Game Play! - First person combat, horror, puzzles, stealth and numerous hidden secrets.
• A Beautiful Cartoon World! - Lovingly crafted by a small indie studio.
• A Global Bendy Community! - Delve deep into the mystery and join the discussion at joeydrewstudios.com

us.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

us.description:
A groundbreaking roguelite experience awaits you:
◆ A unique fusion of deck-building and tactical grid-based combat.
◆ Innovative multi-card playing mechanics deliver a fresh strategic twist.

As a strategy game designed for hardcore players, Lost in Fantaland offers:
◆ Randomly generated battlefields and map nodes, creating diverse and dynamic combat scenarios.
◆ Six distinct classes, each with a completely different deck-building playstyle.
◆ Over 300 cards and 100 artifacts and items — every run is a brand-new adventure full of surprises!
◆ Progressive difficulty across multiple runs, testing your strategy and adaptability.
◆ Fragmented progress saving, allowing you to play in short bursts or dive into a full 90-minute session whenever you like.

us.description:
This is a fantastical tale of an exotic land. The Old Empire has fallen, leaving rival tribes to fight for control of the great desert. Little do they know of the seeds of darkness which grow in the shadows with each passing day...

Sands of Salzaar is an open-world strategy-action RPG set across a sprawling desert. Build up and manage your forces from a single unit to a mighty army, then lead them into massive battles against your foes. How you progress is up to you: customize your hero with a wide variety of skills and talents, choose which factions to side with, and plan your strategies carefully to establish yourself as whoever you aspire to be - a lone wolf, a wealthy trader, a city lord, or a war schemer.

us.description:
Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.
【Ascend to the Top with Immortal Cultivation A Journey of a Lifetime】
Step into the enchanting world of the Tale of Immortal, where cultivation is an art that requires more than just financial means and help from fellow cultivators. To truly master it, one must possess a deep understanding of the craft and have access to the right cultivation venues. But that's not all—the journey is fraught with danger, as you'll face unpredictable monsters, crisis-ridden mystic realms, insurmountable barriers, and brilliant treasures waiting to be discovered.
【NPCs with a Life of Their Own AI-Driven Interactive Ecology】
Embrace a fully-realized NPC world, where each character is a unique entity with their own friends, family, and life trajectory— completely independent of your progress. However, if you choose to meddle, you certainly can!
【Surprising Encounters Await Experience a Fascinating Story】
Are you ready to embark on a thrilling adventure? One where you might become the hero who saves the day and wins the heart of the love of your life? Or maybe you're looking to stir up some jealousy in your crush and have them fight for your affection? How about fulfilling a fifty-year-old promise or getting caught up in the struggle of a mysterious organization? Perhaps you'll uncover a long-forgotten treasure, only to have it snatched away by a cunning adversary?
【From Conquering the Territories to Uniting the World Building the Strongest Sect】
Do you want to take your sect to new heights of power and glory? We've got the ultimate sect management gameplay that lets you experience the full range of sect life: from humble disciple to mighty sect master. Join a massive sect and work your way up from the bottom, or take on the challenge of leading a fallen sect back to prominence.
【Martial Arts, Monsters, and Immortals Building Your Unique School】
To embark on an epic adventure, you need to hone your skills and become a true warrior.

Start by building a solid foundation of cultivation. Your mind skills are crucial to success, so focus on cultivating a powerful mindset. From there, you can delve into martial and spiritual skills to take your abilities to the next level. As you explore, keep an eye out for opportunities to create edges with your motion and special skills. And don't forget to tap into your ultimate skills to save the day when necessary.
【The Triad of Power Artifact, Alchemy, and Talismans】
Sharpen your skills and harness the power of tools!

At the start, you get to choose from three formidable weapons, each offering a distinct cultivation system. The Bagua Jade grants you the ability to revive yourself and your chosen ally, the Eye of Providence allows you to steal Beast Skills and gain unparalleled insights into the world, and the Mythical Gourd empowers you to capture a Boss and enlist it as your loyal sidekick: command it to fight by your side or to search for treasure on your behalf.

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

us.description:
Requirements of The Last Warlord:
To ensure the game's normal operation, it is required that iOS version should be higher than iOS Version 16 and use iPhone X or X Plus, iPhone 12 or above, or iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 or any iPad Pro to run the game. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/threekingdomsthelastwarlord
Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/577230/discussions/1/

Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord is a turn-based lord-playing strategy game developed by the Chengdu Longyou Studio. The studio created this game world set in the period of the Three Kingdoms mainly based on people's opinions on other games set in that period. The game is very detailed in depicting the differences between various cities and also the abilities and features of the military officers. The game also applies an appealing battle system in which weather, landforms, and many other factors will influence the result of each battle.
The game is based on the famous Chinese historical novel by Luo Guanzhong (about A.D. 1330 - 1400). 

I. Simple and graceful graphics finished by fine-lined drawing
The portrait of every character in the game is finished by fine-lined drawing with the same style as the picture-story books "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". All interfaces of the game are designed in a typical Chinese style.

II. The governing modes are easy to get started with:
There are easy governing modes in the game so that players can manage various affairs easily and spend more time enjoying its other facets. Due to the game's lord-playing mode, players do not need to pay much attention to cities besides their own capital. Instead, they can order prefects to govern other cities and later on give them commands when necessary.

III. A rich variety of gameplay and contents
Over 1,300 officers are available in the game (including those recorded in historical books and novels).
There are up to 30 attributes for officers.
Over 300 features of officers are available.
Over 500 kinds of verified precious items have been applied to the game world for players of different preferences to choose from.
Over 60 cities of different styles and 200 features of cities are available.
There are also abundant techs research and development items.
Its system of combat units contains three main kinds of combat units and about 20 kinds of special combat units.
Ultra abundant official positions.
Numerous simulated natural phenomena, incidents and disasters will highly represent the calamitous period of the Three Kingdoms.
Travelling around will trigger various incidents. 

IV. The turn-based battle mode requires careful planning in deploying troops
Weather, landforms, and even the height of the battlefield will influence any battles in the game.
There's also a siege mechanism with a great gaming environment. There are various siege vehicles for players to storm castles and also defending their own castles. 

V. Other functions
There are also other functions available in the game.
Cloud Save
Steam Cards
The achievement system allows players to collect and show off achievements.
